title: All.We.Need.of.Hell_Harry.Crews_mobi.epub.zip.txt
description:
Harry Crews' brilliant 1987 novel about the meltdown and redemption of one Duffy Deeter. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Crews for more information.

The novel is long out of print and under dubious copyright status. This electronic version was scanned, in the public interest and for no financial remuneration, from the hardcover first edition originally published by Harper & Row in 1987.

May the writings of Mr. Crews be available and enjoyed for as long as possible, his true legacy
